description.name: pyusderc20
description.tagline: PYUSD erc20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto erc20-pyusd Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept PYUSD erc20 directly on your website
Unique erc20/pyusd receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your erc20/pyusd wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
